alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 30 at 7:42AM MST until October 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT /5 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
